description: A woman in her seventies and her son have been killed by an anti-tank missile attack on northern Israel.
maintext: "You cook while being afraid of being hit by an air strike. You go out to buy something from the market and all the prices are really high. Our morals have been shattered, we have no hope of returning back to our homes," Um Sharif Khalil, who was displaced from the north of Gaza, said.
title: Hezbollah missile attack kills Israeli woman and son
